#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()

{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	
	while(T--)
	{
		long long int N;
		cin>>N;
		
		if(N<=26)
		cout<<"1";
		
		else
		{
			long long int ans;
			ans=N/26;
			
			if(N%26!=0)
			ans++;
			
			cout<<ans;
		}
		
		cout<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
